column6: WHO KILLED SPYDER-MAN?! JIM RHODES' investigation of the murder of one of TECHNOPOLIS' few superheroes takes an unexpected and dangerous turn What kind of ramifications will the plans and machinations of ARNO STARK and THE KINGPIN have on BARON TONY STARK? As KIRI fights through her grief by continuing her work on new armored creations we see how they may change the face of Technopolis...and beyond...forever!
column8: | penciller (cover):Paul Rivoche | writer:James Robinson | artist:Marcio Takara
